entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, who is getting ready to leave Privet Drive.

entities.name: aunt
entities.description: Harry's aunt, whose identity is not specified in this passage. She is mentioned as someone who might burn Harry's belongings.

entities.name: uncle
entities.description: Harry's uncle, whose identity is not specified in this passage. He is mentioned as someone who might burn Harry's belongings along with his aunt.

entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: A gamekeeper at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry, who gave Harry a photograph album.

entities.name: hedwig
entities.description: Harry's snowy owl, who is sitting on his desk.

entities.name: r.a.b.
entities.description: The initials of a person whose note is inside the locket. The identity of R.A.B. is not specified in this passage.

relationships.description: Harry wonders what his aunt and uncle would do with his belongings, implying that he is concerned about their well-being.
Hagrid gave Harry a photograph album, establishing a relationship between the two characters.
Harry owns Hedwig, his snowy owl, which is sitting on his desk.
